actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1993, the duty on composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.
